dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 1550 IH: Strengthening America’s Turning Point Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Stefanik (for herself and Mr. Tonko) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To redesignate Saratoga National Historical Park as Saratoga National Battlefield Park.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Strengthening America’s Turning Point Act.

subsection.text: Saratoga National Historical Park shall hereafter be known and designated as Saratoga National Battlefield Park.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to Saratoga National Historical Park shall be deemed to be a reference to Saratoga National Battlefield Park.
